sentences.sContent: The blare of the car horn alerted the members of the Story family who realised 17-year-old Ben's Toyota was no longer parked in the driveway of their home in Larkspur near Denver.
sentences.sContent_eng: The blare of the car horn alerted the members of the Story family who realised 17-year-old Ben's Toyota was no longer parked in the driveway of their home in Larkspur near Denver.
sentences.sCn: 汽车喇叭的嘟嘟声惊动了Story一家，他们意识到17岁Ben的丰田车不再停在他们家的车道上了。 Story一家住在丹佛附近的拉克斯博(Larkspur)。

sentences.sContent: The blare of the car horn alerted the members of the Story family who realized 17-year-old Ben's Toyota was no longer parked in the driveway of their home in Larkspur near Denver.
sentences.sContent_eng: The blare of the car horn alerted the members of the Story family who realized 17-year-old Ben's Toyota was no longer parked in the driveway of their home in Larkspur near Denver.
sentences.sCn: 汽车喇叭的嘟嘟声惊动了Story一家，他们意识到17岁Ben的丰田车不再停在他们家的车道上了。 Story一家住在丹佛附近的拉克斯博(Larkspur)。

sentences.sContent: Another blare of trumpets signaled that the limousine carrying Brezhnev had entered the Southwest Gate .
sentences.sContent_eng: Another blare of trumpets signaled that the limousine carrying Brezhnev had entered the Southwest Gate .
sentences.sCn: 在又一阵军号声中，勃列日涅夫的小轿车进入西南门。

remMethod.val: 和bleat(n. 羊的叫声)来自同一词源
